alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 6:17PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Jackson and northeastern DeKalb Counties through 645 PM CDT... At 615 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Pisgah to just west of Hollywood, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts o f40 to 50 mph and dime size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Henagar, Stevenson, Hollywood, Section, Ider, Pisgah, Dutton, Martintown and Rosalie. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
